entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
